abstract: With the new year, the T.S.A. has a chance to adopt “intelligence-driven, risk-based” rules and expand the known-traveler program.
snippet: With the new year, the T.S.A. has a chance to adopt “intelligence-driven, risk-based” rules and expand the known-traveler program.
lead_paragraph: MY daughter, who was always a resourceful child, showed up for the Thanksgiving visit with her husband, our three small grandchildren and a homemade apple pie.

headline.main: Carry On a Christmas Pie, Not a Merry Snow Globe
headline.print_headline: Carry On a Christmas Pie, Not a Merry Snow Globe

abstract: According to a new report to be issued Wednesday by Nielsen, the market research firm, Google and Apple are both winning in the mobile smartphone race. Android has become the operating system of choice for most consumers, partly because of the inexpensive handset options available through phone carriers. Apple’s iPhone has become the predominant hardware choice, for 29 percent of all smartphone owners.
snippet: According to a new report to be issued Wednesday by Nielsen, the market research firm, Google and Apple are both winning in the mobile smartphone race. Android has become the operating system of choice for most consumers, partly because of the ine...
lead_paragraph: It is not very often that you get two winners and two losers in the same competition. Yet according to a new report to be issued Wednesday by Nielsen, the market research firm, Google and Apple are both winning in the mobile smartphone race.

headline.main: Google and Apple Are Both Winners in Mobile Race, Report Says

abstract: RIM’s decision to bring some BlackBerry features to Apple iPhones and iPads as well as smartphones and tablet computers running Google’s Android operating system was driven by the large number of corporations that are letting employees choose their own smartphones.
snippet: RIM’s decision to bring some BlackBerry features to Apple iPhones and iPads as well as smartphones and tablet computers running Google’s Android operating system was driven by the large number of corporations that are letting employees choose thei...
lead_paragraph: OTTAWA — The maker of the BlackBerry announced details on Tuesday of how it will try to bring some BlackBerry features to Apple iPhones and iPads as well as smartphones and tablet computers running Google’s Android operating system.

headline.main: RIM Reacts to Bring-Your-Own Devices Policies
